-----------------------------------------------
	UnInstall Package
----------------------------------------------
	To UnInstall the package and remove dependencies run the following command:
	
	UnInstall-Package MongoJsonActiveMQ -RemoveDependencies
	
	This will remove all package information and dependencies

----------------------------------------------
	Mongo DB Drivers
--------------------------------------------
	This is the CSharp Drivers for Mongo DB
	http://www.mongodb.org
	
--------------------------------------------
	Apache Active MQ
--------------------------------------------
	To use active MQ to write messages

--------------------------------------------
	JayRock
--------------------------------------------
	CSharp json serialization dll for posting messages

--------------------------------------------
	CodeScales.Http
--------------------------------------------
	Http post client for C# for posting to MUX
